articles.title: FPI inflow hits 9-month high in May on strong domestic macro-outlook | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Foreign Portfolio Investors (FPIs) invested  ₹43,838 crore in Indian equities in May, the highest in nine months, and continued buying in June, with  ₹6,490 crore invested in two trading sessions.
